title: Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2007 SP3 VL x86 en-US October
description:
*********************************************************************
Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2007 SP3 VL x86 en-US October 2015
*********************************************************************

Includes: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Publisher, Access, InfoPath

Release Info

- Language: en-US
- Channel: Volume License
- Version: 12.0.6607.1000
- Added updates 14/10/2015: KB3085615, KB3085544, KB3085617, KB3085618, KB3085619
- File: ProPlus12.x86.en-US-2015.10.iso
- Size:  1.87 GB (uncompressed)

Installation

- Extract all files from ProPlus12.x86.en-US-2015.10.zip INTO THE SAME FOLDER
- Within this folder, run batch file makeiso.bat, this will convert compressed file ProPlus12.x86.en-US-2015.10.daa into ProPlus12.x86.en-US-2015.10.iso
- Mount or burn ProPlus12.x86.en-US-2015.10.iso
- Install Office 2007 using one of the provided keys in key.txt
- Install Office File Validation + Visual Studio for Office Runtime (required) from folder "Run after install"
- Install desired Add-ins from folder "Add-ins" (includes: Classic Menu for Office 2007 v7.50, FileFormatConverters, PowerPointViewer, SaveAsPDFandXPS, Wordview_en-us)

Please SEED for a while!

Datasheet http://www.jmu.edu/bookstore/pdf/OfficeProPlus2007Datasheet.pdf
